00009 #ifndef __CLIENT_ACCUMULATOR_H__
00010 #define __CLIENT_ACCUMULATOR_H__
00011 
00012 #ifdef OMISCID_RUNING_TEST
00013 
00014 // Standard includes
00015 #include <ServiceControl/UserFriendlyAPI.h>
00016 
00017 // declare test function as external
00018 extern int DoClientAccumulator( int argc, char*argv[] );
00019 
00020 namespace Omiscid {
00021 
00022 /* @brief thread to run client accumulator */
00023 class RunClientAccumulator : public Thread
00024 {
00025 public:
00026     RunClientAccumulator() :
00027 #ifdef DEBUG_THREAD
00028     Thread( "RunClientAccumulator" )
00029 #else
00030     Thread()
00031 #endif
00032     {
00033     };
00034 
00035     ~RunClientAccumulator() {};
00036 
00037     void Start()
00038     {
00039         StartThread();
00040     }
00041 
00042     virtual void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE Run()
00043     {
00044         // Just call the client accumulator function
00045         // Array used to give parameters
00046         char* LocalArgv[2];
00047         LocalArgv[0] = "ClientAccumulator called in RunClientAccumulator";
00048         LocalArgv[1] = NULL;
00049 
00050         DoClientAccumulator( 1, LocalArgv );
00051     }
00052 };
00053 
00054 } // namespace Omiscid
00055 
00056 #endif // OMISCID_RUNING_TEST
00057 
00058 #endif // __CLIENT_ACCUMULATOR_H__
